public class LocalMediaContainer

This class encapsulates a MediaItemContainer found locally on the device

Method Detail

getChildren

public MediaObject[] getChildren()
This method gets all the child media items of this container. It also filters out empty containers if the provider was created with prettyView set to true

Overrides:
getChildren in class MediaContainer
Returns:
an array of all the child MediaItems of this container
See Also:
MediaContainer.getChildren()
